entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
